Text:
Thanks for the up, but why did you ZIP file files? It would have been nice to pick and choose specific shows to download instead of having to grab the whole thing.

Thanks anyways.

Here's the deal.
If I released thousands of MP3's, I'd  expect only a handful being seeded by others.
That would eat up mainly MY bandwidth every time someone started downloading.
great upload man how did u manage to get the shows though? did u rip or record a live broadcast of the shows?
